sentences.en: A firm and persistent warrior stood reverently beside him, accompanied by a beauty in splendid attire.
sentences.cn: 一名坚定刚毅的武士恭敬的站在由一位华服美女陪伴的老人的旁边.

sentences.en: As Hetty concluded, she reverently unrolled a small English Bible from its envelope of coarse calico.
sentences.cn: 海蒂说完, 就庄重地从印花粗布套子里拿出一本小版本英语《圣经》.

sentences.en: As the store clerk reverently lifted the object out of the case, I knew it would be too small.
sentences.cn: 当店员恭敬地从柜台里取出这个物品时，我知道它肯定太小了。

sentences.en: Gently and reverently they removed with their own hands the body of Jesus from the cross.
sentences.cn: 他们谨慎而恭敬地亲手把耶稣的身体从十字架上取下来.

sentences.en: He kept the objects safe in their glass cases, some reverently laid on red cloth.
sentences.cn: 他把这些东西每件都安放在各自的玻璃盒子里, 有些下面还虔诚地铺着红布.

sentences.en: He spoke reverently about colleges and loved walking around the Stanford campus.
sentences.cn: 他虔诚地谈到大学，说自己喜欢在斯坦佛校园漫步。

sentences.en: He'd pull the shirt out of the bag reverently and comment on its features.
sentences.cn: 他会虔诚地把这件衬衫从袋子中拉出来,然后对它的质量赞不绝口.

sentences.en: I put the book reverently back in its place.
sentences.cn: 我恭恭敬敬地把这本书放回原处.

sentences.en: Let us now very reverently examine ourselves as we partake of the bread and wine.
sentences.cn: 在我们掰饼喝酒的时候,让我们虔诚的查验我们自己.

sentences.en: Pork gazed at it reverently and slowly delight spread over his face.
sentences.cn: 波克怀着愉快的心情看着这只表,脸上慢慢显出十分崇敬的神色.

sentences.en: Then slowly, reverently, I inserted the key and wound the clock It'sprang to life.
sentences.cn: 然后, 我慢慢地,恭恭敬敬地将钥匙插入钟里去, 上动了发条,钥匙点燃了钟的生命.

sentences.en: There, many thousands of years ago, a nameless people reverently buried their loved ones.
sentences.cn: 就在数千年前的此地，一群无名无姓的人虔诚地埋葬了他们所深爱的人。

sentences.en: They all reverently bowed their heads and hearts.
sentences.cn: 全家人都虔诚地低下了头,在心里致敬.

sentences.en: To express their thanks for the year's bounty, they reverently ask for continued blessings.
sentences.cn: 为他们一年来所受到的上苍的恩典表示感谢, 虔诚地祈求上帝继续赐福.

words.tran_cn: 虔诚的；表示尊敬的；可尊敬的
